sentences.en: A coral reef is built by the accretion of tiny, identical organisms.
sentences.cn: 珊瑚礁是由许多相同的微生物不断堆积而成。

sentences.en: A mother who already has non-identical twins is more likely to conceive another set of twins.
sentences.cn: 生育过非同卵双胞胎的母亲再怀上双胞胎的可能性更大。

sentences.en: I am in the identical predicament with yourself.
sentences.cn: 我和你处于同样的窘境之中.

sentences.en: My opinion is identical with his.
sentences.cn: 我的意见与他的观点相同.

sentences.en: She wore the identical dress on both occasions.
sentences.cn: 她在两种场合穿的是同一件衣服.

sentences.en: Somewhere in the depths of the pine forest an identical sound reverberated.
sentences.cn: 从松林深处传来一声回响。

sentences.en: The bindings of the books were identical.
sentences.cn: 这些书的装帧完全相同.

sentences.en: The handwriting on both cheques is identical.
sentences.cn: 两张支票上的笔迹完全相同.

sentences.en: Their views on this problem are identical.
sentences.cn: 大家对于这个问题的看法是一致的.

sentences.en: These are identical prints made from a wood - block.
sentences.cn: 这是用一块木板印出来的完全相同的画.

sentences.en: They churn out 3 000 identical toy trains every day.
sentences.cn: 他们每天生产3000辆一式一样的玩具火车.

sentences.en: This is the identical knife with which the murder was committed.
sentences.cn: 这就是谋杀时所用的刀子.

words.tran_cn: 可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的
可辨认地；可看作是相同地
身份；同一性，一致；特性；恒等式

phrases.tran_cn: n. 同卵双生，全等双生

trans.tran_cn: 同一的，完全同样的，相同的，恒等的，同卵的
trans.tran_en: exactly the same, or very similar
